00059 /***************************************************************************/
00076 void TIMER_Init(TIMER_TypeDef *timer, const TIMER_Init_TypeDef *init)
00077 {
00078   EFM_ASSERT(TIMER_REF_VALID(timer));
00079 
00080   /* Stop timer if specified to be disabled (dosn't hurt if already stopped) */
00081   if (!(init->enable))
00082   {
00083     timer->CMD = TIMER_CMD_STOP;
00084   }
00085 
00086   /* Reset counter */
00087   timer->CNT = _TIMER_CNT_RESETVALUE;
00088 
00089   timer->CTRL = ((uint32_t)(init->prescale)     << _TIMER_CTRL_PRESC_SHIFT)
00090                 | ((uint32_t)(init->clkSel)     << _TIMER_CTRL_CLKSEL_SHIFT)
00091                 | ((uint32_t)(init->fallAction) << _TIMER_CTRL_FALLA_SHIFT)
00092                 | ((uint32_t)(init->riseAction) << _TIMER_CTRL_RISEA_SHIFT)
00093                 | ((uint32_t)(init->mode)       << _TIMER_CTRL_MODE_SHIFT)
00094                 | (init->debugRun               ?   TIMER_CTRL_DEBUGRUN  : 0)
00095                 | (init->dmaClrAct              ?   TIMER_CTRL_DMACLRACT : 0)
00096                 | (init->quadModeX4             ?   TIMER_CTRL_QDM_X4    : 0)
00097                 | (init->oneShot                ?   TIMER_CTRL_OSMEN     : 0)
00098 
00099 #if defined(TIMER_CTRL_X2CNT) && defined(TIMER_CTRL_ATI)
00100                 | (init->count2x                ?   TIMER_CTRL_X2CNT     : 0)
00101                 | (init->ati                    ?   TIMER_CTRL_ATI       : 0)
00102 #endif
00103                 | (init->sync                   ?   TIMER_CTRL_SYNC      : 0);
00104 
00105   /* Start timer if specified to be enabled (dosn't hurt if already started) */
00106   if (init->enable)
00107   {
00108     timer->CMD = TIMER_CMD_START;
00109   }
00110 }

00113 /***************************************************************************/
00130 void TIMER_InitCC(TIMER_TypeDef *timer,
00131                   unsigned int ch,
00132                   const TIMER_InitCC_TypeDef *init)
00133 {
00134   EFM_ASSERT(TIMER_REF_VALID(timer));
00135   EFM_ASSERT(TIMER_CH_VALID(ch));
00136 
00137   timer->CC[ch].CTRL =
00138     ((uint32_t)(init->eventCtrl) << _TIMER_CC_CTRL_ICEVCTRL_SHIFT)
00139     | ((uint32_t)(init->edge)    << _TIMER_CC_CTRL_ICEDGE_SHIFT)
00140     | ((uint32_t)(init->prsSel)  << _TIMER_CC_CTRL_PRSSEL_SHIFT)
00141     | ((uint32_t)(init->cufoa)   << _TIMER_CC_CTRL_CUFOA_SHIFT)
00142     | ((uint32_t)(init->cofoa)   << _TIMER_CC_CTRL_COFOA_SHIFT)
00143     | ((uint32_t)(init->cmoa)    << _TIMER_CC_CTRL_CMOA_SHIFT)
00144     | ((uint32_t)(init->mode)    << _TIMER_CC_CTRL_MODE_SHIFT)
00145     | (init->filter              ?   TIMER_CC_CTRL_FILT_ENABLE : 0)
00146     | (init->prsInput            ?   TIMER_CC_CTRL_INSEL_PRS   : 0)
00147     | (init->coist               ?   TIMER_CC_CTRL_COIST       : 0)
00148     | (init->outInvert           ?   TIMER_CC_CTRL_OUTINV      : 0);
00149 }

00152 #if defined(_TIMER_DTCTRL_MASK)
00153 /***************************************************************************/
00163 void TIMER_InitDTI(TIMER_TypeDef *timer, const TIMER_InitDTI_TypeDef *init)
00164 {
00165   EFM_ASSERT(TIMER0 == timer);
00166 
00167   /* Make sure the DTI unit is disabled while initializing. */
00168   TIMER_EnableDTI (timer, false);
00169 
00170   /* Setup the DTCTRL register.
00171      The enable bit will be set at the end of the function if specified. */
00172   timer->DTCTRL =
00173     (init->autoRestart              ?   TIMER_DTCTRL_DTDAS   : 0)
00174     | (init->activeLowOut           ?   TIMER_DTCTRL_DTIPOL  : 0)
00175     | (init->invertComplementaryOut ?   TIMER_DTCTRL_DTCINV  : 0)
00176     | (init->enablePrsSource        ?   TIMER_DTCTRL_DTPRSEN : 0)
00177     | ((uint32_t)(init->prsSel)     << _TIMER_DTCTRL_DTPRSSEL_SHIFT);
00178 
00179   /* Setup the DTTIME register. */
00180   timer->DTTIME =
00181     ((uint32_t)(init->prescale)   << _TIMER_DTTIME_DTPRESC_SHIFT)
00182     | ((uint32_t)(init->riseTime) << _TIMER_DTTIME_DTRISET_SHIFT)
00183     | ((uint32_t)(init->fallTime) << _TIMER_DTTIME_DTFALLT_SHIFT);
00184 
00185   /* Setup the DTFC register. */
00186   timer->DTFC =
00187     (init->enableFaultSourceCoreLockup      ?   TIMER_DTFC_DTLOCKUPFEN : 0)
00188     | (init->enableFaultSourceDebugger      ?   TIMER_DTFC_DTDBGFEN    : 0)
00189     | (init->enableFaultSourcePrsSel0       ?   TIMER_DTFC_DTPRS0FEN   : 0)
00190     | (init->enableFaultSourcePrsSel1       ?   TIMER_DTFC_DTPRS1FEN   : 0)
00191     | ((uint32_t)(init->faultAction)        << _TIMER_DTFC_DTFA_SHIFT)
00192     | ((uint32_t)(init->faultSourcePrsSel0) << _TIMER_DTFC_DTPRS0FSEL_SHIFT)
00193     | ((uint32_t)(init->faultSourcePrsSel1) << _TIMER_DTFC_DTPRS1FSEL_SHIFT);
00194 
00195   /* Setup the DTOGEN register. */
00196   timer->DTOGEN = init->outputsEnableMask;
00197 
00198   /* Clear any previous DTI faults.  */
00199   TIMER_ClearDTIFault(timer, TIMER_GetDTIFault(timer));
00200 
00201   /* Enable/disable before returning. */
00202   TIMER_EnableDTI (timer, init->enable);
00203 }
00204 #endif

00207 /***************************************************************************/
00218 void TIMER_Reset(TIMER_TypeDef *timer)
00219 {
00220   int i;
00221 
00222   EFM_ASSERT(TIMER_REF_VALID(timer));
00223 
00224   /* Make sure disabled first, before resetting other registers */
00225   timer->CMD = TIMER_CMD_STOP;
00226 
00227   timer->CTRL = _TIMER_CTRL_RESETVALUE;
00228   timer->IEN  = _TIMER_IEN_RESETVALUE;
00229   timer->IFC  = _TIMER_IFC_MASK;
00230   timer->TOP  = _TIMER_TOP_RESETVALUE;
00231   timer->TOPB = _TIMER_TOPB_RESETVALUE;
00232   timer->CNT  = _TIMER_CNT_RESETVALUE;
00233   /* Do not reset route register, setting should be done independently */
00234   /* (Note: ROUTE register may be locked by DTLOCK register.) */
00235 
00236   for (i = 0; TIMER_CH_VALID(i); i++)
00237   {
00238     timer->CC[i].CTRL = _TIMER_CC_CTRL_RESETVALUE;
00239     timer->CC[i].CCV  = _TIMER_CC_CCV_RESETVALUE;
00240     timer->CC[i].CCVB = _TIMER_CC_CCVB_RESETVALUE;
00241   }
00242 
00243   /* Reset dead time insertion module, no effect on timers without DTI */
00244 
00245 #if defined(TIMER_DTLOCK_LOCKKEY_UNLOCK)
00246   /* Unlock DTI registers first in case locked */
00247   timer->DTLOCK = TIMER_DTLOCK_LOCKKEY_UNLOCK;
00248 
00249   timer->DTCTRL   = _TIMER_DTCTRL_RESETVALUE;
00250   timer->DTTIME   = _TIMER_DTTIME_RESETVALUE;
00251   timer->DTFC     = _TIMER_DTFC_RESETVALUE;
00252   timer->DTOGEN   = _TIMER_DTOGEN_RESETVALUE;
00253   timer->DTFAULTC = _TIMER_DTFAULTC_MASK;
00254 #endif
00255 }
